pr_title: Use input streams instead of byte[] when parsing NeTEx files

timeline.bodyText: This method is no longer in use and should be deleted.
timeline.author: t2gran

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure if it was needed somewhere else -- it's been removed.
replies.author: flaktack

timeline.message:
Use input streams instead of byte[] when parsing NeTEx files

Use `DataSource#asInputSteam()` for parsing NeTEx documents to avoid
loading the whole document into memory with `asBytes()`.
